html:
6.23.20  9:11 am   How to sing

      start by pretending to sing

6.23.20  8:20 am   what are your actual thoughts on velcro?

      it's both an instrument and a lyric

6.23.20  6:52 am   Do you have any regrets? 

      the only regret would be revealing my regrets, which fortunately i haven't done, and therefore have no regrets. which is the other reason i can't reveal them. so as you can see, not revealing my regrets is both a reactive and preventative measure

6.23.20  6:26 am   tips on improving musical time?

      play twice as fast, that way you can get 2 songs in

6.23.20  6:08 am   Do you have a special favor to meteorology? Why did you mention it so many times

      i mentioned it 1 time, and that was only due to my lifelong obsession and addiction to it

6.23.20  5:43 am   how do i write a cool song

      impossible. it can't be done

6.23.20  5:29 am   your song predicted that one time Mt St Helens blew up right

      could be one of the other times

6.23.20  5:13 am   Love your music, they give me chills every time. my favorite is "I just did a bad thing" you are working on music if im not mistaken.

     that's true

      Do we have an estimate.-JB

      your estimate is correct

6.23.20  5:09 am   do you purposefully make your songs connect (in a way) or does it just kinda happen

      try to connect them all to the earth if possible

6.23.20  4:02 am   what green things (that aren't plants or other organisms camouflaged to look like plants) naturally occur in nature? I can't think of any.

      aurora borealis

6.23.20  2:31 am   hello artist. if i think outside the box, i'm still thinking inside a second, bigger, broader box. and if i get outside of that one, there's a third box that i am informed we were inside all along. is there a last box outside which my thinking can finally be free? and if there is, how do i know if i've found it?

      the moment of clarity occurs when switching boxes, or when swicthing between switching boxes and staying in a box

6.23.20  1:36 am   what should I draw today?

      tomorrow

6.23.20  1:03 am   will i ever be big enough for the mall?

      you are too big for the mall. the mall is too small for the internet. and you have grown larger, by going on the internet

6.23.20  12:43 am   How are you so unique compared to this mundane world?

      it all stems back to that time i figured out that chess was actually still fun even if you throw away the instructions

6.23.20  12:22 am   How to think?

      it's like a really small and more often version of being struck by lightning

6.22.20  11:35 pm   Why does it seem like every year gets worse?

      it cam seem like that if you are either ignoring new good things or bad old things

6.22.20  10:57 pm   How do you music?

      it's really just different combinations of 1 and 2

6.22.20  10:31 pm   Who is best pony?

      each pony is better than every other pony

6.22.20  10:11 pm   What're some tips for becoming a journalist?

      i think you have to be annointed by another journalist

6.22.20  9:17 pm   what color is the grass today

      it's like blue but totally different

6.22.20  9:06 pm   do you prefer to model characters or environments

      i'll let you know when i can do either

6.22.20  9:06 pm   what do you fear?

      everything

6.22.20  8:45 pm   what colour is red?

      it's like blue but totally different

6.22.20  8:18 pm   What did I ask?

      maybe it was this

6.22.20  8:10 pm   What would you say your biggest strength is?

      probably my muscles

6.22.20  7:46 pm   do you agree with the sentiment that, if we were to rotate the timeline so that the end is pointed towards us, we'll be able to see everything that's ever happened, is happening, and will happen all at once, instead of having to time-travel?

      well, the more i think about it i realize that time is already all in one place, it's space that is usually in all different places. which is really the basis for time behaving the way it does

6.22.20  7:09 pm   how do you stop being scared of everything 

      just pick 1 thing each week to stop being scared of

6.22.20  5:44 pm   Does one need to feel the song to properly make it

      i would think so

6.22.20  5:30 pm   have you ever thought about fossils?

      sometimes i dream about them

6.22.20  4:55 pm   How can you be so positive?

      found out about science

6.22.20  4:52 pm   what's the guy from "hi, i'm steve"'s real name?

      i think it's the same as yours

6.22.20  4:49 pm   what shape is the universe

      this may not be what you want to hear, but it's kind of shaped like you

6.22.20  4:38 pm   how do i get you to answer seriously

      ask a question. or just say anything really. i'm an 'over-answerer'. i'll answer rocks if i'm not careful

6.22.20  3:11 pm   What are your political views on socks and sandals

      seems like common sense really

6.22.20  2:57 pm   How does reinventing the graphics department work?

      the first thing that happens is, final cut 7 gets secretly cancelled 9 years ago

6.22.20  2:41 pm   has steve (oh wait that's not his name, sorry) ever found out where the mountians came from?

      they are an answer, a sort of counterbalance, to some of the seemingly lighter-weight material shown previously

6.22.20  1:54 pm   do you usually come up with song ideas at random times (walking, reading, lying in bed, etc) or do you tend to deliberately sit down and try to write something?

     can do both

6.22.20  1:54 pm   can you give me some words of positive encouragement?

      sure

6.22.20  1:47 pm   Sooo new video next Tuesday and every other Tuesday after???????

      oh that sounds delicious. but i'm still deciding how hands should work...........

6.22.20  1:18 pm   answer me did you fall in love on the q train

      might have fallen in love WITH the Q train

6.22.20  12:27 pm   You're my inspiration to pursue art and to think outside of the box.

      just make sure you watch out for that second box

6.22.20  12:10 pm   Can you give me words of inspiration?

      sure

6.22.20  11:51 am   do u have default phone ringtone/notif sounds or did you add ur own

      none, my phone does not ring

6.22.20  11:45 am   i want to learn the piano. i already have an old casio keyboard. what do i do next

      make sure a loud and soft note sounds different. if they don't, then that's possibly a problem and then i'll tell you what to do from there

6.22.20  11:27 am   what is your favourite thing?

      the 'item'

6.22.20  11:02 am   Your songs are absolutely amazing. They really make me feel good about myself. Thank you Bill for your wonderful works.

      holy national forest reserve you are very friendly

6.22.20  10:12 am   What's your opinion on 7/8 time signiture? 

      you'll have to specify if that's just for 1 time use, or continuous

6.22.20  9:44 am   Why does the day go on?

      this is for your benefit

6.22.20  8:49 am   Can you tell me a funny joke?

      that's impossible. jokes are not funny

6.22.20  8:23 am   how do aeroplanes fly in the sky when there are no ropes to hold it?

      they use aer to hold it instead
